title: Nineteen Lincolns
description: portrait of brown-eyed, bearded man dressed as President Lincoln; man seated with joined hands resting in lap; four pins on PL lapel; top button on vest and white shirt unbuttoned; blurry trees and blue sky in distance; framed behind glass in black wood frame; one of a set of 18 photographs to be displayed together
creditline: The Shirley Mahowald and Henry Kinsell Endowment for Art Acquisition
